column4: anyone able to tell me what exactly console-kit-daemon does?  It seems to use up to 50% of my CPU when I am doing CPU intensive things (like compiling)
Ive seen otehrs  with bugs/issues with that thing going berzerk also.
yea, I've done some googling, and I can't seem to find a straight answer of what exactly its supposed to do for me :)
hmmm it seems to have to do with fastswitching with gnome ..... I don't even have X installed on this particular machine .. haha
